media.headline: Nunez scores on infield hit
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Nunez scores from second on infield single
media.bigblurb: Joe Panik hits an infield single up the middle and Eduardo Nunez hustles to score from second base to give the Giants a 1-0 lead in the 2nd

media.headline: Drury safe at first
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Drury safe at first following review
media.bigblurb: Brandon Drury beats the throw to first base, following an overturned call in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Pence's RBI single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Pence rips RBI single into left
media.bigblurb: Hunter Pence rips an RBI single into left field to score Brandon Belt and give the Giants a 2-0 lead in the top of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Owings' RBI single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Owings lines RBI single through middle
media.bigblurb: Chris Owings lines an RBI single through the middle to score A.J. Pollock to cut the Giants lead to 3-1 in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Belt's solo smash
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Belt crushes solo home run to center
media.bigblurb: Brandon Belt crushes a solo home run to extend the Giants lead to 4-1 in the top of the 5th inning

media.headline: Two score on Belt's error
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Lamb reaches on Belt's error, two score
media.bigblurb: Jake Lamb hits a ball to Brandon Belt that goes through his legs, allowing Chris Owings and Paul Goldschmidt to score in the 5th inning

media.headline: Tomas' RBI double
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Tomas lines RBI double to right
media.bigblurb: Yasmany Tomas lines an RBI double to right to score Jake Lamb and tie the game 4-4 in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Pollock's RBI single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Pollock knocks in Hazelbaker with single
media.bigblurb: A.J. Pollock drives in Jeremy Hazelbaker with a single to right field, extending the D-backs' lead to 6-4 in the bottom of the 6th inning

media.headline: Hazelbaker's RBI double
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Hazelbaker cracks RBI double to right
media.bigblurb: Jeremy Hazelbaker cracks an RBI double into right scoring Chris Iannetta and giving the D-Backs a 5-4 lead in the bottom of the 6th inning

media.headline: Drury's RBI single to right
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Drury plates Herrmann with single to right
media.bigblurb: Brandon Drury singles into right field, scoring Chris Herrmann to extend the D-backs' lead in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Ahmed's RBI double
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Ahmed lines RBI double to left, Drury scores
media.bigblurb: Nick Ahmed lines an RBI double to right to score Brandon Drury and extend the D-Backs' lead to 8-4 in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Ramirez picks off Ahmed
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Ramirez throws to third to nab Ahmed
media.bigblurb: Neil Ramirez picks off Nick Ahmed attempting to steal third base, where he is eventually tagged out in a rundown in the bottom of the 7th

media.headline: Hill's RBI walk
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Hill draws walk to score Posey
media.bigblurb: Aaron Hill walks to bring home Buster Posey with the bases loaded to bring the Giants closer in the 8th inning

media.headline: Rodney notches the save
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Rodney retires Pence to earn the save
media.bigblurb: Fernando Rodney gets Hunter Pence to line out to center field to earn the save in the D-backs' 8-6 win over the Giants

media.headline: Belt runs out triple
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Belt rips ball to right to run out triple
media.bigblurb: Brandon Belt rips a ball to right field and turns on the jets to beat out the throw at third for a triple in the top of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Pence runs out triple
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Pence smacks triple off top of wall
media.bigblurb: Hunter Pence smacks a ball off the top of the center-field wall and runs out a triple in the top of the 1st inning

media.headline: Crawford's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Crawford smacks sac fly to left, Pence scores
media.bigblurb: Brandon Crawford smacks a sacrifice fly to left field to score Hunter Pence to extend the Giants lead to 3-0 in the top of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Walker strikes out seven
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Walker fans seven in D-backs debut
media.bigblurb: Taijuan Walker strikes out seven over six innings in his debut for the D-backs, earning the win in an 8-6 victory over the Giants

media.headline: Goldy's 100th career SB
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Goldy steals 100th career base in 5th
media.bigblurb: Paul Goldschmidt steals second as part of a double steal with Chris Owings, for his 100th career stolen base

media.headline: Lovullo talks Walker, Hazelbaker
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Lovullo happy with total team effort
media.bigblurb: Manager Torey Lovullo praises Taijuan Walker's start, breaks down Jeremy Hazelbaker's key at-bat and expresses optimism for the season

media.headline: Recap: SF 6, ARI 8
media.blurb: 4/5/17: Pollock, Owings pace D-backs to 8-6 victory
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: A.J. Pollock and Chris Owings collected five of the team's 12 hits and Fernando Rodney finished off the save in an 8-6 win

media.headline: Bochy talks loss to D-backs
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bochy on Belt's error, hitters' timing
media.bigblurb: Bruce Bochy talks about Brandon Belt's untimely error, missed offensAive opportunities and the need for his hitters to get more at-bats

media.headline: 4/5/17 CG: SF@ARI
media.blurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: SF@ARI
media.bigblurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: SF@ARI
